title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529 - When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Select both P1 and P2 from the project list.
3. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
